dmca.title: APCM DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
The following message has been automatically forwarded to your
address for consultation, based on the contents of the message.

Replies to this message will be returned to the Trakken system,
and not sent to the customer.  A customer service agent will review
the information you provide, and compose a response to the customer,
if necessary.

For more information on this ticket, click the link below:
http://trax/html/trax.html?ticket_id=1004781229

Thanks for your help.

The text of the message follows, and the full message is attached.


Original Message Follows:
------------------------
From: "Juanita" 
Subject: Unauthorized Distribution of Copyrighted APCM MÃ©xico A. C.
Date: Fri, 13 Apr 2012 16:29:52 -0500

ATTN: 



By this means we declare that APCM MÃ©xico â€“ AsociaciÃ³n Protectora de Cine y MÃºsica de MÃ©xico, A.C.- is the authorized legal representative of the phonogram producers SONY BMG MUSIC ENTERTAINMENT MEXICO; EMI MUSIC MEXICO; UNIVERSAL MUSIC MEXICO; WARNER MUSIC MEXICO; UNIVISION MUSIC; AZTECA RECORDS, members of the International Federation of the Phonographic Industry (IFPI) in Mexico; as well as legal representative of the film studios COLUMBIA PICTURES INDUSTRIES, INC.; DISNEY ENTERPRISES, INC.; PARAMOUNT PICTURES CORPORATION; TRISTAR PICTURES, INC.; TWENTIETH CENTURY FOX FILM CORPORATION; UNITED ARTISTS PICTURES, INC.; UNITED ARTISTS CORPORATION; UNIVERSAL CITY STUDIOS, LLLP; WARNER BROS. ENTERTAINMENT INC., members of the Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Mexico.



Part of our job is the supervision of Internet, and to take measures against the persons who promote, offer, or facilitate the sale and distribution of products which infringe the rights of our members. APCM Mexico believes in good faith that the products offered by the third parties that we mention for their commercialization, infringe the interests of the holder of the copyrights and related rights regarding one or more protected works; these infringing products are offered in a way not authorized by our members, their representatives or the law.   



The works with copyright we are referring to, are being illegally offered and/or commercialized by making contact with the electronic mail karaokeymusica@yahoo.es, which appears at the bottom of the blog; that is why we request the removal of the blog http://karaoke-y-musica.blogspot.mx/ promptly. It is important to mention that the only objective of the blog is to commercialize works protected by copyright; the administrator of the blog does not have authorization from the holder of the copyright or legal representatives, for the sale or promotion of this kind of products.   



We think this information should be sufficient so that you can locate the material matter of this complaint, however, do not hesitate to contact us if you have any question or request for clarification, by responding to this e-mail.  



I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is truthful, and that I am the holder of the right or person legally authorized by the holder of an exclusive right that is allegedly being infringed, to act.



      Legal Representative
     
     Anti-Piracy Contact
     
      Ricardo Tapia GarcÃ­a

      Legal Director

      APCM MÃ©xico

      Juan de Lafontaine #42, Polanco Chapultepec

      DelegaciÃ³n Miguel Hidalgo, MÃ©xico, D. F.

     Juana Pichardo Barrios
